requirementsDescription: Complete the tasks below to claim your rewards. You can always go back and check the information if you’re not sure how.
somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong, please try again.

requirements.RadQuestQuiz: Learn about RadQuest and your guide, Jetty

WelcomeToRadQuest.title: Welcome to RadQuest
WelcomeToRadQuest.introDescription: Let’s get started learning about Web3 and Radix – and get some rewards!

requirements.RadixQuiz: Learn about the Radix Network and dApps

WhatIsRadix.title: The Radix Network
WhatIsRadix.introDescription: The Radix Network – a breakthrough “layer 1” network for mainstream-ready Web3.

requirements.ConnectWallet: Download the Radix Wallet mobile app, create your first account Login to RadQuest with your Radix Wallet

GetRadixWallet.title: Get the Radix Wallet
GetRadixWallet.description: Your key to dApps and assets on Radix
GetRadixWallet.introDescription: Get the Radix Wallet to use with RadQuest any any other dApp built on Radix

requirements.JettyReceivedClams: Get your first XRD and NFT rewards

FirstTransactionQuest.title: Get Some (Web3) Stuff!
FirstTransactionQuest.introDescription: Learn about XRD and transactions – and use them to claim your first quest rewards right to your Radix Wallet.
FirstTransactionQuest.enterYourPhoneNumber: Please enter your phone number to receive an SMS code for verification.
FirstTransactionQuest.weWillNotShare: We will not share your phone number with anyone, and we will not send you any messages other than this verification.
FirstTransactionQuest.allowMarketing: I allow RadQuest to add me to the marketing newsletter

TransferTokens.title: Transfer Assets
TransferTokens.description: Transfer stuff using the Radix Wallet
TransferTokens.introDescription: Use the Radix Wallet’s transfer feature to send tokens, NFTs, and any other kind of asset to different accounts and other people.

StakingQuest.title: Radix Network Staking
StakingQuest.introDescription: Put your XRD to work helping secure the Radix Network – and earning you some yield

MayaQuest.title: Thorswap Quest
MayaQuest.description: Learn about Thorswap and how to bridge tokens
MayaQuest.introDescription: Thorswap is a decentralized exchange that allows you to swap tokens across different blockchains. Learn more about Thorswap and how to bridge tokens.

requirements.MayaRouterWithdrawEvent: Do at least one bridge/swap of >$50 value

ReferralQuest.title: Invite Your Friends Quest
ReferralQuest.description: Invite your friends to give them XRD tokens and earn rewards!
ReferralQuest.introDescription: You came to RadQuest following Matt’s link, join his party
ReferralQuest.copyReferral: Copy your referral link and send it to your friends.
ReferralQuest.referralsSoFarDescription: These friends have signed up using your link and completed the basic quests. You each get 10 XRD!
ReferralQuest.info_1: Your friends will get 10 XRD when they use your referral link and complete all basic quests.
ReferralQuest.info_2: You’ll also receive 10 XRD for each referral and you’ll win extra rewards at each milestone (5, 10, 15 and 20 referrals)!
ReferralQuest.referMore: Refer {{count}} more friends to claim your rewards and progress to {{nextLevel}}!
ReferralQuest.unlockedSuperLevel: You have unlocked the secret tier!
ReferralQuest.rewardsWaiting: You have rewards waiting for you! Don’t forget to claim!
ReferralQuest.unlockedSuperLevelInfo: Please email {{mail}} to claim your XRD tokens.
ReferralQuest.SuperLevelInfo: Want to keep referring? Contact Radix to find out about our influencer reward scheme!
ReferralQuest.SuperLevelButton: Want to keep referring? Contact Radix to find out about our influencer reward scheme!

SwapQuest.title: Decentralized Exchange (DEX)
SwapQuest.description: Learn how to swap one token for another at a changing market rate.
SwapQuest.introDescription:
Learn about DEXes
Swap one token for another kind of token

InstapassQuest.title: Instapass
InstapassQuest.introDescription: Instapass is a way to log in to websites without a password. Learn more about Instapass.
